snippet: JONES--David L. Mar. 10, 1953 - Jan. 26, 2014 Happy Birthday David! You would be 63 today. We so miss seeing you, and having you home with us. Have fun celebrating with Max, Scruffy and Marietta! You are always on our minds, and we miss you more than ever. All our love always, Danny & Bobby 1/3
lead_paragraph: JONES--David L. Mar. 10, 1953 - Jan. 26, 2014 Happy Birthday David! You would be 63 today. We so miss seeing you, and having you home with us. Have fun celebrating with Max, Scruffy and Marietta! You are always on our minds, and we miss you more than ever. All our love always, Danny & Bobby 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  JONES, DAVID L
